sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message: Use this block to add/edit content to current section. You can select heading size ( h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6) You can make anything Bold You can align text You can add extra button with the shortcode

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
Use this block to edit layout of the current section. 
Your content can be 50/75/100% width and centered

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message: Use this block to add/edit content to current section. The content is separated for left and right column You can select heading size ( h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6) You can make anything Bold You can align text You can add extra button with the shortcode

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message: Use this block to add/edit content to current section. The content is separated for heading and rest of the content You can select heading size ( h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6) You can make anything Bold You can align text You can add extra button with the shortcode

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
Use this block to add/edit content to current section. 

HTML video = select video file from file library
oEmbed = Vimeo/Youtube
Poster = preview image, before video started

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
You can change layout of the section here
Full width = to the edge of the screen
wrapped = limited by container. Have some space to the edge

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
You can add/edit content here

- Add content
- Add up to 2 buttons
- Add media

etc.

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
You can add/edit content here

- Add some text, make it bold or align
- Add image/video/lottie svg

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message: You can add heading to the section here and select to show some articles ( select by hands or show all)

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message: Form shortocde can be found at ninja forms section or at contact form 7 section

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
You can Add/Edit content here:
- Add heading
- Add heading on the left
- Add any amount of icons

sub_fields.label: After Heading
sub_fields.name: after_heading
sub_fields.instructions: It works only if Heading is number

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message: Add testimonials as a post type and then select here to display on the page

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message: Add as many images as you want to show them as gallery

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
You can add/edit content here

- Add heading
- Add row of labels/titles for tabs
- Add row of contents for tabs

sub_fields.label: Instructions
sub_fields.message:
You can add/edit content here

- Add social media
- Add image
- Add form shortcode from any form builder( Contact form 7 or Ninja forms)
